product_name: Imagine Surf Mission GC Stand Up Paddle Board - 11'
long_description: With a sleek displacement hull and plum bow combined with ample width and a flat standing area, this fast and stable board is fantastic for touring, fitness training and recreational racing.
short_description: With a sleek displacement hull and plum bow combined with ample width and a flat standing area, this fast and stable board is fantastic for touring, fitness training and recreational racing.
